title: CVStreet.2014.FRENCH-En.Subtitles.DVDRip.x264
description:
==========================================
CVSTREET, the movie
==========================================
CVStreet group pastes posters of unemployed people in the streets.
Then the project became a reality-TV against unemployment.
How far can we be entertained with other's misfortune?
This is based on a true story.
